basic.description:
The origin, composition and diagenesis of carbonate rocks. Study of modern carbonate sediments and depositional environments; development of facies models; petrographic and geochemical analysis of limestones and dolostones. Required extended field trip during term.
NOTE     Required extended field trip during term. Please contact the Department for more information.
LEARNING HOURS    121 (33L;18Lb;70P)
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Carbonate Sedimentology

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    GEOL238 or permission of the Department.
Corequisite    GEOL301.
